dish_description: Tender chicken in a creamy tomato sauce with Indian spices.
Grilled cubes of marinated paneer cheese with peppers and onions.
Slow-cooked lamb in a rich, aromatic curry sauce.
Spicy chickpea curry with tomatoes, onions, and fresh coriander.
Potato and cauliflower curry with turmeric and cumin.
Fragrant basmati rice with chicken, saffron, and spices.
Slow-cooked black lentils in a creamy sauce.
Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, roasted in a tandoor oven.
Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.
Soft, leavened bread baked with garlic and butter.
Cubes of paneer cheese in a creamy spinach sauce.
Fish fillets simmered in coconut milk and spices.
Okra stir-fried with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Sweet milk dumplings soaked in rose-flavored syrup.
Yogurt with cucumber, mint, and spices.
Grilled chicken in a creamy tomato and spice sauce.
Mixed vegetables in a mild, creamy sauce with nuts.
Sweet mango yogurt drink.
Crispy shells filled with spicy potatoes and tangy water.
Soft cheese balls soaked in sugar syrup.
Spiced Indian tea brewed with milk and sugar.
Refreshing Indian lemonade with lime, mint, and spices.
Sweet, spiced milk drink with almonds, saffron, and rose water.
